title: Users selling LoL account within the game?
body:
It happened yesterday, a user wanted me to add him in my friends list and I did so, then the bloke asked me if I wanted to buy the account.
I blocked him and no drama but that lead me to think that that could be the main reason why too many players race to get high level account it doesn't matter team play rules.
They are pretty selfish and usually rude players.
What are you thoughts?
Do you also do the same thing?? :P

replies.body: I hope you reported them. Selling accounts is a banable offence.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2H310Ai3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-15T02:01:23.534+0000)
> I hope you reported them. Selling accounts is a banable offence.

I preferred to leave it because I would feel sad, I play LoL to have fun not to argue with idiots.
Could you please advise me how create the e-mail alert? I didn't get your replay in my e-mail account.

> [{quoted}](name=GangOne,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2H310Ai3,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2014-12-15T05:44:28.920+0000)
> I preferred to leave it because I would feel sad, I play LoL to have fun not to argue with idiots.

Then shame on you for not reporting them. All you have to do is notify Riot that these people are breaking the rules and that's it. No argument required. But now, since you didn't report them, they will continue to sell accounts. Shame OP, shame.

> Could you please advise me how create the e-mail alert? I didn't get your replay in my e-mail account.

I was not aware there were e-mail alerts for boards...
